instructions: Open the Google Home app . Make sure your mobile phone or tablet is on the same Wi-Fi network as your Google Home. In the bottom right corner of the main screen, tap the Account icon . Check that the Google Account listed is the one linked to Google Home . To switch accounts, tap the downward facing arrow to the right of the account name. Tap the house to return to the main screen. Select Add . Under Manage services , select Videos and photos . Select LINK under YouTube Kids. If you wish to proceed, select GET STARTED . You ll be prompted to sign in with your Google account to verify your identity, in order to link YouTube Kids. You ll need to use the same Google account as the one you re using with your Google Home. Select DONE on the final screen to complete setup.

Open the Google Home app . Make sure your mobile phone or tablet is on the same Wi-Fi network as your Google Home. In the bottom right corner of the main screen, tap the Account icon . Check that the Google Account listed is the one linked to Google Home . To switch accounts, tap the downward facing arrow to the right of the account name. Tap the house icon to return to the main screen. Select Add . Under Manage services , select Videos and photos . Select UNLINK under YouTube Kids.
